description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget called HomeScreen, which is the main screen of a notes app. It manages searching, viewing modes (grid/list), and navigation to note editing and viewing screens. It also contains internal widgets for displaying notes in grid or list format.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the notes application's home screen, managing app bar actions, notes display, and navigation.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, handling search mode toggle and building the widget tree.

classes.name: _NotesGrid
classes.description: Widget for displaying notes in a masonry grid layout.

classes.name: _NotesList
classes.description: Widget for displaying notes in a list view.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for HomeScreen, assembling the scaffold with app bar, body, and floating action button.
